item.name: Get all users with description and params with type

variable.description: This is just a user type

request.description:
Obtain a list of users descriptions

# postman-to-openapi

## path
| object | name     | description                    | required | type   | example   |
|--------|----------|--------------------------------|----------|--------|-----------|
| path   | user_id  | This is just a user identifier | true     | number | 476587598 |
| path   | type | Group of the type              | true     | string | ADMIN    |

## body
| name              | description                     | required | type   |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------- | -------- | ------ |
| group_id          | This is just a group identifier | true     | number |
| user              | Object of the user              | true     | object |
| user.id           | Identifier of the user          | true     | number |
| user.name         | Name of the user                | true     | string |
| user.info         | Information of the user            | false     | object |
| user.info.gender | Gender of the user             | false     | string |
| user.info.age | Age of the user             | false     | number |
| others            | This is for options, but should give empty array             | true    | string[] |
